```{r km, cache=cacheon}

kmfunc <- function(time, event, eventname, efcat, yposplus = rep(0, 3)) {
  fit <- survfit(formula(paste0("Surv(", time, ",", event, "=='Yes') ~ ht")),
    data = pdata %>% filter(shf_ef_cat == efcat)
  )

  ## logrank
  sd <- survdiff(formula(paste0("Surv(", time, ",", event, "=='Yes') ~ ht")),
    data = pdata %>% filter(shf_ef_cat == efcat)
  )

  p <- dF(pchisq(sd$chisq, length(sd$n) - 1, lower.tail = FALSE), dig = 3, p = TRUE)

  # c(bottom, left, top, right)
  par(mar = c(4, 4, 1, 4.5) + 0.1)
  plots <- plot(fit,
    fun = "event",
    ylab = eventname,
    xscale = 30.5,
    yscale = 100,
    col = global_kicols,
    mark.time = FALSE,
    bty = "n",
    xlim = c(0, 3 * 365),
    ylim = c(0, 1),
    xlab = "Years",
    axes = F,
    lwd = 3,
    lty = c(1, 2, 3),
    xaxs = "i", yaxs = "i"
  )

  axis(2, seq(0, 1, 0.25), seq(0, 100, 25), las = 2)
  axis(1, at = seq(0, 3, 1) * 365, seq(0, 3, 1))

  ypos <- 1 - summary(fit, 3 * 365)$surv
  ytext <- c("Normal BP", "Non-TRH", "aTRH")

  ylabs <- bind_cols(ypos = ypos, ytext = ytext) %>%
    arrange(ypos)

  mtext(
    side = 4,
    line = .2,
    at = ylabs$ypos + yposplus,
    ylabs$ytext,
    las = 1
  )

  text(0.1 * 365, 0.75, paste0("Log-rank p = ", p), pos = 4)
}
```
